text: Sin Don (신돈, 辛旽; 21 January 1322 – 21 August 1371Sin Don died on 11st days 7th months 1371 in Lunar calendar.) was a Korean Goryeo Dynasty scholar, politician, and Buddhist monk. His first name was Pyeonjo (편조, 遍照). a penname was Chunghangeosa (청한거사, 淸閑居士). His Chinese style name was Yogong (요공, 耀空).
